author: barvic
body:
75X - Fix for handling of rare cases of CSC CFEB data corruptions with incorrect 16 samples flag reporting.
- Limit CSC CFEB maximum expected and unpacked samples to 8, to prevent CSC RECO assertion failures, when CFEBs send corrupted data with 16 samples flag set. 
  Refer to https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/recoDevelopment/1395.html thread.
  74X - PR #12186
title: 75X - Fix for handling of rare cases of CSC CFEB data corruptions with incorrect 16 samples flag reporting
